features.title: Why Choose QueuePilot?
features.subtitle: Discover the powerful features that make QueuePilot the best choice for your business.

feature1.title: Optimized Workflow
feature1.description: Dramatically reduce wait times and improve your clinic's overall operational efficiency with real-time queue visibility for proactive patient flow management.

feature2.title: Enhanced Experience for All
feature2.description: Intuitive UI for staff and doctors, plus a public display keeping patients informed, reducing anxiety and improving their overall clinic experience.

feature3.title: Centralized Management
feature3.description: From patient registration to managing doctors, specialties, offices, and public display ads—all key clinic operations in one platform.

feature4.title: Key Reports & Analytics
feature4.description: Access detailed reports and statistics on clinic performance, wait times, and occupancy by doctor/specialty to make informed decisions.

feature5.title: Multilingual Support
feature5.description: Available in Spanish (default) and English, facilitating adoption in diverse environments and improving communication.

howItWorks.title: Simple Steps to Efficiency
howItWorks.subtitle: See how QueuePilot manages the entire patient journey from arrival to service completion.

step1.title: Quick Registration
step1.description: Patients register easily at reception or a kiosk, joining the queue for their chosen service or doctor. Status: 'Waiting'.

step2.title: Informed Waiting & Calling
step2.description: Patients see their turn on public displays. Doctors or staff call the next patient, changing their status to 'Calling'.

step3.title: Consultation & Completion
step3.description: After consultation, the doctor marks status as 'Completed'. Data is logged for analytics, optimizing clinic operations.
